SENT.plain: A woman with ulcerative colitis was treated with sulphasalazine and prednisolone
After four months' treatment she began to get short of breath and she died a month later with severe subacute fibrosing alveolitis
It is believed that the lung disease was caused by sulphasalazine and that prednisolone was not able to prevent its development
A reversible form of lung disease has previously been attributed to this drug
